mapper.select: SELECT a.goods_id,question_contents,question_date, answer_contents,answer_date,count(li.user_id) AS count FROM answers as a Join questions as q ON a.question_id = q.question_id LEFT JOIN qa_like as li ON a.answer_id = li.answer_id WHERE a.goods_id = #{goodsId} GROUP BY li.answer_id ORDER BY ${orderByCol} DESC LIMIT #{start},#{number}
